授業目的: TOEICの目的、各セクション、問題の特徴を理解し、スコアアップのためのストラテジーを学び実践します。
到達目標:
1. TOEICのパターンに慣れ、スコアアップを図る
2. そのために必要な語彙知識の補強と文法の復習をし、受験のためのスピードと正確性をアップする
3. 英語学習に役立つストラテジーを他の受講者とシェアする
関連科目: 春と秋は同一内容のコースです
授業方法:
- The primary activities are test practices, presentations, and discussions.
- You need a computer/tablet to participate in those activities.

第1回:
All 14 sessions will be conducted in-person.
Course introduction, sample test, sample vocabulary quiz 1, sample presentation, presentation sign-up
第2回: Practice for listening 1 (TOEIC Part 1), vocabulary quiz 2, student presentation 1
第3回: Practice for listening 2 (TOEIC Part 2), vocabulary quiz 2, student presentation 2
第4回: Practice for listening 3 (TOEIC Part 3), vocabulary quiz 4, student presentation 3
第5回: Practice for listening 4 (TOEIC Part 4), vocabulary quiz 5, student presentation 4
第6回: Review test of Part 1-4, vocabulary quiz 6
第7回: Practice reading 1 (TOEIC Part 5), vocabulary review quiz 1-6, students presentation 5
第8回: Practice reading 2 (TOEIC Part 5), vocabulary quiz 7, students presentation 6
第9回: Practice reading 3 (TOEIC Part 6), vocabulary quiz 8, students presentation 7
第10回: Practice reading 4 (TOEIC Part 7, single-document questions 1/2), vocabulary quiz 9, students presentation 8
第11回: Practice reading 5 (TOEIC Part 7, single-document questions 2/2), vocabulary quiz 10 students presentation 9
第12回: Practice reading 6 (TOEIC Part 7, multiple-document questions 1/2), vocabulary quiz 11, students presentation 10
第13回: Review test of Pat 5-6, vocabulary quiz 12, Practice reading 6 (TOEIC Part 7, multiple-document questions 2/2)
第14回: Review test of Part 7, vocabulary review quiz 7-12

成績評価Grading0: 評価基準等　Grading Criteria etc.
成績評価Grading1: Assessed by quizzes, review tests, presentation, and participation.
